entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Pelican Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Island Falls 6:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -21.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -24.8°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Snow at times heavy over southern sections late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over southern sections. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
